about_the_game:
Missi is a cozy point & click game in a watercolor hand-drawn world. Find hidden objects and solve puzzles using clues in sketches of past adventures. Try to trick the Mushroom Spider and the Crow King by collecting all medicinal herbs for the sick little mouse.

MAGICAL JOURNEY AND CHARACTERS

Join the brave little mouse Missi on an enchanting adventure, where she encounters magical creatures and solves a wide variety of unique puzzles. Bring a dragon statue to life, brew potions with a swamp witch, and immerse yourself in other fairy-tale adventures in this atmospheric 2D point & click game. Friendly inhabitants of the colorful world are always ready to assist you in finding items or solving puzzles.


WATERCOLOR AESTHETIC

The game features cute illustrations in a cozy watercolor style. There's no need for competition or combat here. Simply enjoy a relaxing experience as you uncover the secrets of the mouse's burrow, help a frog astronomer, or save a thirsty mandrake on Fish Island. The game contains minimal text, with all dialogues conveyed through adorable drawings.


VARIETY OF PUZZLES

Missi offers a wide array of puzzles, some of which may be quite challenging. Be sure to consult the sketchbook, where episodes of your past adventures are recorded, and thoroughly explore every corner of the magical world for clues.

name: Missi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Missi is a cozy point & click game in a watercolor hand-drawn world. Find hidden objects and solve puzzles using clues in sketches of past adventures. Try to trick the Mushroom Spider and the Crow King by collecting all medicinal herbs for the sick little mouse.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Danish, Indonesian, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
